document.full_text: aerosmith rocker steven tyler will publish his memoirs worldwide on may 3, promising to share "all the unexpurgated, brain-jangling tales of debauchery, sex & drugs, transcendence & chemical dependence you will ever want to hear."
document.title: aerosmith rocker promises debauched memoirs
lines_and_colors: aerosmith rocker steven tyler will publish his memoirs worldwide on may 3, promising to share "all the unexpurgated, brain-jangling tales of debauchery, sex & drugs, transcendence & chemical dependence you will ever want to hear."
